attributes.action: Bring criminal charges against Maria Miller.
attributes.additional_details:
Maria Miller committed fraud against the tax payer. We see no reason why this illegal activity should not be passed to the courts for judgment.

If any member of the public had defrauded the taxpayer to such an ammount they would face the same. We, the undersigned see no reason why Maria Miller should be exempt from being charged and tried ad a criminal.

rejection.details: This is an operational policing matter.
